paper_title.en: Performance analysis of Go-back-N ARQ scheme with elective repeat in intra-block

description.en: The performances of the Go-back-N ARQ scheme with selective repeat in intra-block (GBN-SR) and revised GBN-SR (Rev-GBN-SR) schemes are analyzed. Using the derived generating function of the service time of a packet, the throughputs of the proposed schemes are compared with that of Benelli's scheme. It Is shown that the proposed Rev-GBN-SR scheme shows good performance in a wider range from low to high packet error rate regions.

paper_title.en: Traffic characteristics of Go-back-N ARQ scheme with selective repeat in intra-block
paper_title.ja: ブロック内選択再送Go-back-N ARQ方式のトラヒック特性

description.en: This paper discusses the traffic characteristics of the Go-back-N (GBN)_SR scheme, in which the receiver returns the acknowledge signal blockwise and selective repeat is performed within the retransmission block. First the strict expression for the throughput and the strict expression for the average transmission delay of the blockwise bulk arrival model are derived. Then, the throughput of the GBN_SR scheme and the average transmission delay of the blockwise bulk arrival model are examined by numerical calculation. The average transmission delay of the packetwise bulk arrival model is investigated by simulation. It is shown that the throughput is improved with increasing block size, and that the average transmission delay can be minimized by using the optimal block size, depending on the average packet error rate and the block arrival rate. It is also shown for the packetwise bulk arrival model that there exists a block size which minimizes the average transmission delay, and that the minimum average transmission delay is smaller than in the blockwise bulk arrival model. © 2002 Wiley Periodicals, Inc. Electron. Comm. Jpn. Pt. 1.

paper_title.en: Throughput analysis of go-back-N ARQ scheme with selective repeat in intra-block

description.en: In this paper, we determine an exact formula for the throughput performance of the GBN SR scheme, in which the go-back-N ARQ scheme is used for inter-block transmission and the selective repeat scheme is used for intra-block transmission. Using that formula, the throughput performance of GBN SR scheme is compared with that of Benelli's (1986, 1993) scheme in a numerical manner. As a result, it is shown that the throughput performance of the GBN SR scheme is superior to that of Benelli's scheme in a wider range of packet error rate from low to medium, but is inferior at high packet error rates.

publisher.en: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers Inc.

publication_name.en: IEEE Wireless Communications and Networking Conference, WCNC

paper_title.en: Throughput analysis of tandem Go-back-N ARQ scheme

description.en: Throughput performance of a Go-back-N ARQ scheme is determined by two main factors, packet error rate and round-trip propagation delay. This paper studies the tandem Go-back-N ARQ scheme, where the round-trip propagation delay is virtually reduced and its throughput performance is improved. The main purpose of the tandem Go-back-N ARQ scheme is to reduce the long propagation delay by means of implementing functions of error-detecting, buffering and packet-retransmitting, and retransmission-requesting with the intermediate node, such as the on-board processor of a communication satellite. First, an exact expression for the throughput is analyzed. Then, using this result, it is shown that the performance of the tandem Go-back-N scheme is always better than that of the standard Go-back-N scheme.

publication_name.en: Electronics and Communications in Japan, Part I: Communications (English translation of Denshi Tsushin Gakkai Ronbunshi)

paper_title.en: Delay performances of tandem go‐back‐n arq scheme

description.en: The performances (throughput and transmission delay) of the Go‐back‐N ARQ scheme are affected greatly by the bit error rate of the link and the round‐trip propagation delay. This paper discusses the transmission delay of the tandem Go‐back‐N scheme, in which the round‐trip propagation delay can substantially be reduced. First, the generating function for the transmission delay distribution is derived, and then the result is applied to derive the average transmission delay. As a result, it is shown clearly that the performance of the tandem Go‐back‐N ARQ scheme is better than that of the standard Go‐back‐N ARQ scheme. Copyright © 1990 Wiley Periodicals, Inc., A Wiley Company

paper_title.ja: ブロック内選択再送Go-back-N ARQ方式のトラヒック特性（共著）
paper_title.en: Traffic Characteristics of Go-back-N ARQ Scheme with Selective Repeat in Intra-Block

description.ja: 本論文では, 受信機がブロック単位で確認信号を返送し, 再送されるブロック内では選択再送を行うGo-back-N(GBN)_SR方式のトラヒック特性について考察する.まず, スループットの厳密式とブロック単位で集団到着するモデルの平均伝送遅延の厳密式を導出する.次に, 数値計算によりGBN_SR方式のスループットとブロック単位で集団到着するモデルの平均伝送遅延特性について調べ, 更にシミュレーションによりパケット単位で集団到着するモデルの平均伝送遅延特性について調べる.その結果, スループットはブロックサイズが大きいほうが向上し, 平均伝送遅延は平均パケット誤り率とブロックの到着率により, 最適なブロックサイズを選択することで最小にできることを示す.また, パケット単位で集団到着するモデルにおいても, 平均伝送遅延を最小にするブロックサイズが存在し, 最小の平均伝送遅延はブロック単位で集団到着するモデルよりも小さいことを示す.

paper_title.ja: ブロック内選択再送Go-Back-N ARQ方式の遅延解析(共著)
paper_title.en: Transmission Delay Analysis of Go-Back-N ARQ Scheme with Selective Repeat in Intra-Block

description.ja: 本論文では、ブロック単位で確認信号を返送し、再送するブロック内では選択再送を行うGBN(Go-Back-N)_SR方式の伝送遅延特性について考察する。ここでは、ブロックが集団到着するモデルとパケットが集団到着するモデルを取り上げる。プロックが集団到着するモデルでは平均伝送遅延の解析を行い、パケットが集団到着するモデルではシミュレーションにより特性を調べる。その結果、パケットの到着率に対して、伝送遅延を最小にするブロックサイズが存在することを示す。
description.en: In this paper, we consider transmission delay of GBN_SR ARQ scheme, in which Go-Back-N ARQ scheme is used for inter-block transmission and Selective Repeat scheme is used for intra-block transmission. Two arrival models, bulk arrival in blocks and in packets, are considered. The average transmission delay performances are considered by the exact formula for the former model and by simulation for the latter, respectively. As a result, it is shown that optimal block size minimizing average transmission delay exists.

paper_title.en: Estimation of Mean Cell Loss Rate for Dynamic Connection Adimssion Control in ATM Networks
A multi-segment bandwidth reservation protocol for a DQDB subnetwork

description.en: The DQDB MAC Protocol standardized by the IEEE 802.6 Committee is a single segment bandwidth reservation scheme that only reserves bandwidth for one segment in the distributed queue. Recently, multi-segment bandwidth reservation schemes that reserve bandwidth for not only one segment in the distributed queue but also a part of or all segments in the local node queue have been proposed. In this paper, we propose a new multi-segment bandwidth reservation protocol that can quickly react to changes in a node's traffic and can quickly allocate the bandwidth fairly and waste-free. We also evaluate the mean message transmission delay and throughput convergence performance by simulation. As a result, it is shown that the mean message transmission delay can be decreased and the throughput can be quickly converged to fair bandwidth allocation.

presentation_title.ja: Simulation Study on Effects of Traffic Calming Devices on Residential Roads
presentation_title.en: Simulation Study on Effects of Traffic Calming Devices on Residential Roads

presenters_text.en: Nobuyuki SUGIMACHI, Nobuo MISHIMA, Jaesoo Yoo, Yukuo HAYASHIDA

description.ja: 車の安全性能向上による幹線道路での事故減少に対し、生活道路における交通事故は横ばいであるため、シケインやハンプなどによる対策がなされている。本研究では、道路交通シミュレータ(SUMO)を用いて速度制限装置を設置した場合の車の騒音や排気ガスなどの影響について調べた。その結果、装置による車の速度定価による安全確保は可能だが、騒音などは逆に増加する地点があることが示された。

presentation_title.ja: Effects of PLUS-ONE Promotion for Parking Permit Identification Policy
presentation_title.en: Effects of PLUS-ONE Promotion for Parking Permit Identification Policy

presenters_text.en: Nobuyuki SUGIMACHI, Masaru KIYOTA, Yong-Sun OH, Yukuo HAYASHIDA

description.ja: 急速な高齢社会に伴い、車椅子利用者（あるいは妊婦や身体障がい者）専用の駐車場を設置する店が増えており、パーキングパーミット(PP)制度の導入も進んでいる。また、健常者用の駐車場の一部を軽度の障がい者用駐車場に流用するプラスワン運動(PO)も行われているが、駐車違反などにより十分な効果が得られていない。本研究では、実測した車の到着時間や駐車時間を元にシミュレーションモデルを作成し、PPやPOの効果について考察した。
